mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO ,USER_PASSWORD ,USER_ID ,CLASS_NO ,USER_EMAIL ,USER_NAME ,USER_PHONE ,USER_AGE ,TO_CHAR(USER_REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USER_REG_DT ,USER_DEL_YN FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO ( USER_NO, USER_PASSWORD, USER_ID, CLASS_NO, USER_EMAIL, USER_NAME, USER_PHONE, USER_AGE ) VALUES ( USER_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userPassword}, #{userId}, #{classNo}, #{userEmail}, #{userName}, #{userPhone}, #{userAge} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO ,USER_PASSWORD ,USER_ID ,CLASS_NO ,(SELECT CLASS_NAME FROM CLASS_INFO WHERE CLASS_NO = A.CLASS_NO) AS CLASS_NAME ,USER_EMAIL ,USER_NAME ,USER_PHONE ,USER_AGE ,TO_CHAR(USER_REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS USER_REG_DT ,USER_DEL_YN FROM USER_INFO A WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_DEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}

UPDATE USER_INFO SET USER_PASSWORD = #{userPassword}, USER_NAME = #{userName}, CLASS_NO = #{classNo}, USER_PHONE = #{userPhone}, USER_AGE = #{userAge}, USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
